DetailedResults.description: Array of detailed per entity results

OnWatchlist.description: Watchlist status per entity in array

EntityData.description: Entity data per entity in array

EntitiesAnalyzedCount.description: Total number of entities checked against the Watchlist

EntitiesOnWatchlist.description: Returns true if any entities are on Watchlist, otherwise false

EntitiesOnWatchlistCount.description: Total number of entities found on the Watchlist

WatchlistName.description: Name of the Watchlist that was analyzed
